title: How to Make Skittles Marshmallow Pops

steps.headline: Divide the Skittles into colors.
steps.description: Separate them into different bowls, for example, reds goes in one, oranges goes in another, etc.

steps.headline: Powder each color.
steps.description: Use a food processor to thoroughly powder each color. Discard any chunks left over. Ensure that the food processor is thoroughly cleaned out before powdering a different color.

steps.headline: Coat the marshmallows.
Allow the marshmallows to dry.
steps.description: Insert the skewers on a Styrofoam block or on a sheet of parchment paper.
